feature1.explanation: Both texts use commas to separate clauses and provide additional information within sentences.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar level of lexical complexity and word choice.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were present in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the overall assessment of the linguistic features, the likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author is moderate.
